name: Lynx
story: A Belobogian Snow Plains Explorer, and the youngest of the Landau siblings.Calm and collected, with a strong drive for action. Often embarks on solo adventures to explore the snowy wilderness.

skills.name: Ice Crampon Technique
skills.description: Deals minor Quantum DMG to a single enemy.

skills.name: Salted Camping Cans
skills.description: Applies "Survival Response" to a single ally, increases their Max HP, and restores their HP.

skills.name: Snowfield First Aid
skills.description: Dispels 1 debuff from all allies and restores their HP.

skills.name: Outdoor Survival Experience
skills.description: When using Skill or Ultimate, applies continuous healing on the target ally. If the target has "Survival Response," the continuous healing effect additionally increases.

skills.name: Chocolate Energy Bar
skills.description: After this character uses her Technique, at the start of the next battle, all allies are granted a continuous healing effect.

eidolons.name: Morning of Snow Hike
eidolons.description: When healing allies with HP equal to or lower than 50%, Lynx's Outgoing Healing increases by 20%. This effect also works on continuous healing.

eidolons.name: Noon of Portable Furnace
eidolons.description: A target with "Survival Response" can resist debuff application for 1 time(s).

eidolons.name: Afternoon of Avalanche Beacon
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Basic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Dusk of Warm Campfire
eidolons.description: When "Survival Response" is gained, increases the target's ATK by an amount equal to 3% of Lynx's Max HP for 1 turn(s).

eidolons.name: Night of Aurora Tea
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Dawn of Explorers' Chart
eidolons.description: Additionally boosts the Max HP increasing effect of "Survival Response" by an amount equal to 6% of Lynx's Max HP and increases Effect RES by 30%.
